attributes.title: CRO Flywheel: How Microsoft Kickstarted the A/B testing Momentum and keeps it going
attributes.summary: We will learn how Microsoft enables employees to keep the experimentation flywheel turning faster and faster to support and motivate continued funding.
attributes.description:
We will learn how Microsoft enables employees to keep the experimentation flywheel turning faster and faster to support and motivate continued funding.



<!-- GUESTS START -->
Guest: Aleksander Fabijan
